website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight model is great for small jobs around the house.
pros: Long tines reach deep into flower beds, lawns, and gardens
Tines are removable for easy clean up
Lightweight and easy to maneuver in small spaces
Features adjustable handle and telescoping tube
cons: The cord keeps gardeners confined to areas around a power source

customer_reviews.title: Um...well I've paid for it now so I guess I have it.
customer_reviews.text: I assumed that the tines would rotate like a cake mixer, they don't. It's more of and agitation motion with is...meh, at best. It works okay for semi-soft dirt and pushing down. Keep your expectation for being able to move it through the dirt from side the side with any kind of ease.
customer_reviews.author: Addi

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for us
customer_reviews.text: Second year us using this tiller. It’s great, made it very easy for us to cultivate our flower beds. Even my 10-year-old could work with it. Even though a part that held one of the tines fell out almost immediately, we were able to secure the tine with some wire with no further problems. It works exactly as described and does the job well. We have heavy soil mixed with clay, but the tool still did the job. Heads-up though: it clogs and stops if the soil is wet or very moist.
customer_reviews.author: AHP

customer_reviews.title: I used it on my 9 raised beds and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it on my 9 raised beds and it was a lot less work and back pain than doing it by hand. This worked fairly well but dirt often stuck between the tines and many times I had to stop, unplug and clear it. I'm not sure how they might fix that but it would definitely make it a 5 start product if they did.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F.

customer_reviews.title: It is wonderful! I have good soil and use it when ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 79 years old. I used this cultivator to weed between my flowers and plants. It is wonderful! I have good soil and use it when the soil is damp on top. tt maneuvers easily and well between plants. It has helped me to keep my flower gardens looking very good! The harder/dryer your soil is, the more difficult it is to use. It has really been a great help to me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great machine! It's just what I was looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great machine! It's just what I was looking for and couldn't be happier with the purchase. It is easy to handle, was powerful enough to get the job done and was easy to put together. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Ayres-Rawlings

customer_reviews.title: Worked well....until it didn’t
customer_reviews.text: This item worked well to loosen up the soil for me to plant grass. After a few hours of use, a tine broke.
customer_reviews.author: J. Major

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Returned..died after less than 2 hours of use in soft soil
customer_reviews.author: Hmaxim

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I would not have a flower garden if I didn't have this tool. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: lieselotte smuk

customer_reviews.title: It works and is not bad. The tines do not turn all the way ...
customer_reviews.text: It works and is not bad. The tines do not turn all the way aroung the just oscillate about 90 degrees
customer_reviews.author: Danny R. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Threw it away after three uses wires inside stripped and broke off
customer_reviews.author: Sheila M.

customer_reviews.title: Does not even breakup plain black dirt.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it looked like something my wife could use and control. We have good black dirt in our garden and this product will not break up the soil without a great deal of effort. Would rather use a pitch fork (it really does that bad of a job). As far as I am concerned it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Bahr

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Perfection, easy to put together. Less than 15 minutes. Had my flowerbeds toiled and ready to go in less than 2 hours instead of 2 days. Lightweight and easy to handle. I am 69 years old and believe me this is just what I needed. So ladies if you want to save your back, your energy and your time I would highly recommend purchasing this. It is awesome. I am thinking of purchasing another "just in case" this one ever needs repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Black and decker- nope.
customer_reviews.text: Man did I ever have high hopes for this. My dreams were dashed as soon as the tines touched the dirt in my garden. B&D isn't the company it used to be. This was more like a gentle swish swish, and it wasn't even continous. It's going right back in the box and getting returned.
customer_reviews.author: Franchesca Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on soil that isn't soft.
customer_reviews.text: Used it once in our flower garden and it barely broke the surface. My wife got tired half way through and threw it in the garbage. Don't waste your money on this junk unless your soil is already soft.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Minutillo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works largely as expected, but clogs quickly in wet/heavy soil.
customer_reviews.author: Muzza

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER Tiller/Cultivator (GC150)
product_meta.description: The GC150 Corded Garden Cultivator is perfect for the lawn and gardening enthusiast. It features 50% longer tines for greater cultivating depth to efficiently break up soil. Ideal for cultivating planting garden beds, landscaping and weeding. The corded garden cultivator also preps dry and dead spots for lawn re-seeding. The counter-oscillating tines prevents weeds and grass from tangling in the tines during use. It has removable hardened steel tines for easy cleaning, durability, and long life. An adjustable handle and telescoping tube allows user to adjust unit for maximum comfort. The lightweight upright design helps lessen user fatigue during use, versus LGC120. Includes: (1) GC150, (2) Tines.
feature_bullets: Ideal for cultivating planting garden beds, landscaping and weeding
50 percent longer, hardened steel tines for greater cultivating depth
Counter oscillating tines prevents weeds and grass from tangling

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars33 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
